title: Carillon Miami Beach Names Ronel Corbin as Executive Vice President of Health, Wellness & Spa
text:
Carillon Miami Beach
MIAMI BEACH, Fla. , Sept. 2, Carillon Miami Beach , the world-class oceanfront all-suite luxury lifestyle hotel situated on Miami Beach , is pleased to announce the appointment of Ronel Corbin as its new Executive Vice President of Health, Wellness & Spa. A renowned wellness spa expert, Ronel will oversee the growth and strategy of the Spa at the Carillon - the largest luxury wellness spa in South Florida - including top of the line fitness studios and the integrated health and wellness center.
With more than 20 years in the spa industry both in the U.S. and internationally, Ronel brings extensive experience to the iconic Carillon. She is well-versed in every phase of spa development and operations, from concept creation and initial design, to development, implementation, management and training. Most prominent in her professional history, Ronel served as U.S. Senior Vice President for UK-based ESPA International, overseeing North America and South America , including development of the brand, as well as development, training, management, recruitment and operations of ESPA's renowned spas.
"Ronel's knowledge and passion for the ever-evolving health, wellness and spa industries will bring striking energy and innovation to the existing resort and spa offerings, and help to establish inventive treatments and programs unlike those at any other spa in South Florida ," said Lester Scott , Managing Director of the Carillon Miami Beach. "Ronel's creativity and two decades of knowledge will continue to support the hotel's positioning as the most all-encompassing, lifestyle hotel and spa – redefining the way we vacation."
Ronel knew early – at age eight – that she wanted to dedicate her life to helping people heal and lead more optimal lives through spa and wellness. Now well-known and respected as a spa professional, she is also a noted Chinese Medicine Physician with a quarter-century of experience in the Holistic Health and Wellness field. She is Nationally Board Certified in both Acupuncture and Chinese Herbal Medicine, holds degrees in Natural Health Sciences and as a Doctor of Oriental Medicine. Ronel is licensed as an Acupuncture Physician as a Primary Care Provider with the Florida Department of Health.
Along with her expertise in Oriental Medicine, Ronel is also trained in many therapies and services related to spa, fitness, integrative health and wellness. Her passion about finding ways to help people heal is reflected in every aspect of her work and she strives to bring innovation to the world of wellness spas.
"I believe that spa and wellness are the foundation to a fulfilled, productive and happy life," says Ronel. "I have an insatiable curiosity to help people to feel better, which motivates me to find a solution to each and everyone's health concerns. When developing and managing the spa and health operations of the Carillon, I explore every aspect to ensure that they are authentic, purpose-driven healing spaces and deliver services with the goal of optimizing health and longevity and re-energizing the whole person."
Carillon Miami Beach is a portfolio company of Z Capital Partners, L.L.C. Since acquiring the property, Z Capital has recruited some of the most talented leaders in the hospitality industry, including Managing Director Lester Scott , and Vice President and Executive Chef Fritz Zwahlen .
About Carillon Miami Beach
Carillon Miami Beach is an all-suite luxury lifestyle destination hotel at the footsteps of one of the world's most beautiful beaches. Guests will indulge in innovative, modern and ancient spa treatments at South Florida's largest spa, and discover a new model of integrative health and well-being administered by a team of experienced physicians and wellness professionals with a preventive approach to health.
The resort features 150 spacious one- and two-bedroom suites, ranging in size from 720 – 1,200 sq. ft. An array of recreational activities are at guests' fingertips, with over 200 fitness classes offered each week, access to the resort's two-story indoor rock wall and four pools located throughout the property: the Sunrise Pool, Cabana Pool, Sunset Pool and the adult-only rooftop Atlantic Pool.
With the new addition of world-renowned Executive Chef Fritz Zwahlen , enjoy gourmet cuisine bursting with local flavors. Serving fresh, locally-sourced, cuisine, the resort features four dining venues; The Grill is the ideal spot for locals and guests with seasonal menus and the perfect ocean backdrop unlike any other restaurant in Miami Beach ; Carillon Lounge & Cafe, The Cabana, and the Juice Bar.
The Carillon Miami Beach is a member of The Leading Hotels of the World and Leading Spas.
About Z Capital Partners
Z Capital Partners, L.L.C. ("Z Capital Partners") is the private equity management arm of Z Capital Group, L.L.C ("Z Capital"), a leading global alternative investment manager with approximately $2.3 billion of regulatory assets under management with offices in New York, NY ; Lake Forest, IL ; and Zurich, Switzerland . Z Capital Partners pursues a value-oriented, opportunistic approach in private equity that includes making control investments in companies that may require growth capital, balance sheet and/or operational improvements.
Z Capital's investment team has more than a twenty year track record, investing capital of approximately $17 billion in private equity and credit related strategies. Industries in which the principals of Z Capital have invested include consumer products, steel, steel processors, agriculture, consumer food, gaming, hospitality, manufacturing, specialty services and automotive.
Z Capital Partners portfolio companies currently have aggregate worldwide annual revenues of approximately $2 billion , sell products in over 48 countries, and have in excess of 190,000 associates directly and through joint ventures.
For more information, please visit http://www.zcap.net/ .
